page.title: 13SHOPS and PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: {West View Stores}is owned by the Mann family. It has a fairly varied selection of things; apart from many different foods there are a few cleaning things, and just recently they started a butchery section. The{Post Office}is in the stores. The{Corner Shop}sells second hand furniture and things like that, it is owned and run by Mr and Mrs Lee. The old butcher's shop is empty, it will probably be made into an antique shop for visitors. There are fewer shops in Broughton than there used to be years ago. There are two public houses, the{ {Grey Hound}and the{Tally Ho.}They are both very popular with the local people and visitors.
